thread.title: Arizona police release video of fatal self-driving car collision

title: Arizona police release video of fatal self-driving car collision
text:
Arizona police release video of fatal self-driving car collision 8:33pm EDT - 01:36 
Police in Arizona on Wednesday released a short video of a fatal collision between an Uber self-driving vehicle and a pedestrian, as investigators probe the accident that has put new focus on the safety of autonomous vehicles. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Police in Arizona on Wednesday released a short video of a fatal collision between an Uber self-driving vehicle and a pedestrian, as investigators probe the accident that has put new focus on the safety of autonomous vehicles.
